p: The most cited plant families in the present work were Asteraceae, Fabaceae, Lamiaceae, Amaranthaceae, Asteraceae, Asclepiadaceae, Apocynaceae, Acanthaceae, Apiaceae and Poaceae, Annonaceae, Zingiberaceae, and Brassicaceae. All these plant families, as well as others reported in the present review, have been previously investigated in Saudiâ€™s flora ( Alfarhan et al., 1998a, Alfarhan et al., 1998b, Hostettmann et al., 2000)
